QuestData.Title: The Savior of Stoneplow
QuestData.Description: That commander speaks hastily. He has the weapon he needs to win this battle. He has YOU.$b$b"But it's too hard," you might say.$b$bYou would be wrong. It is not too hard. NOTHING IS TOO HARD.$b$bGo now, $n. Go, and save Stoneplow!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Miss Fanny at Stoneplow. Then, with her help, defeat the Mantid Colossus.
QuestData.RewardText: I can't believe it! You - a foreign-born $r - have succeeded where the Shado-Pan have failed. You've succeeded where the WALL has failed.$b$bWe may hold this farming village after all.
